Norway
Elite
Concerto Grosso [Bourgeois]
Grieghallen (Griegsalen), Bergen, Hordaland, Norway Set Test (Friday): 15:30 - 21:00 (Christopher Parkes, Thomas Beiganz & Roger Argente) Own Choice (Saturday): 14:45 - 20.15 (Mark Heron, Haldis Rønning & Ingemar Roos)
